IONIAN SEA.
GREECE TO ITALY.
DNC 09.
SEVEN METER VESSEL, 11 PERSONS ON BOARD,
LEFKADA (38-43N 020-39E) TO SANTA
MARIA DI LEUCA (39-48N 018-21E), REQUIRING ASSISTANCE.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, FAX: 390 6592 2737, E-MAIL:
ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
